string.value: Gaga sent you a strange message.

Secret Agent Gaga tells you to collect 5 Intelligence documents from party quests and then meet Agent C. 

#b<Party Quests where you can find Agent C>
- Moon Bunny's Rice Cake: Level 10 or higher
- First Accompaniment: Level 21 - Level 30
- Crack of Dimension: Level 35 - Level 50
- Tower of the Goddess: Level 51 - Level 70
- Lord Pirate: Level 55 - Level 100
- Romeo and Juliet: Level 71 - Level 85
- Poisonous Fog Forest: Level 45 - Level 55

 #kEach time you retrieve 5 Intelligence documents you will receive #bAgent C's old Receiver#k, and when you retrieve 100 Intelligence documents, you will receive #bAgent C's Titanium Titanium Receiver#k.
Secret Agent Gaga suggested that you go see Agent C at the reward map once you get 5 Intelligence documents from the party quest.
본부로부터 당신에게 지령이 내려왔습니다. 지금 확인하시겠습니까?
지령의 내용은 '파티퀘스트. 요원C. 첩보문서 5개' 이상입니다. 무슨 말인지 잘 이해가 안가신다구요? 그러니까 이 지령의 뜻은 파티퀘스트에서 첩보문서 5개를 모아서 파티퀘스트 보상지역에 있는 요원C를 찾아가라는거에요.
요원C는 정보처리를 담당하고 있는데 현재 현장임무를 수행하기 위해 파티퀘스트에 파견되어 있거든요. 파티퀘스트에 출몰하는 몬스터들이 '마스터M'의 수하들이라는 첩보가 있었어요. 이 몬스터들을 조사해서 첩보문서 5개를 얻으면 요원C를 찾아가 보세요.
요원C가 어디 있냐구요? 당신이 파티퀘스트를 훌륭히 수행한다면 그를 만날 수 있을거예요.
An order was sent to you from headquarters. Do you want to check it now?

The order says #r'Party Quest. Agent C. 5 Intelligence documents'#k. In other words, collect #b5 Intelligence documents#k inside the party quest and take them to #rAgent C#k at the party quest reward area.
There is intelligence that the monsters inside the party quest are #e#rMaster M's#k#n subordinates. Collect 5 Intelligence documents from these monsters and take them to Agent C.

Where is Agent C? If you successfully get through the party quest, you will meet him. Each time you bring him 5 Intelligence documents, you will receive #bAgent C's Old Receiver#k, and when you collect 100, you will receive #bAgent C's Titanium Reciver#k.
I have been waiting for you. Your mission is to investigate the monsters that appear in the party quest and bring back 5 Intelligence documents. Everything is in your hands.
Go see Agent C in the party quest.
